description:
Based on the 1999 "Omikron" PC game. Plot: "Responding to the desperate pleas of a mysterious character from another dimension, your soul must enter the dark and futuristic city of Omikron. You are an entity that can posess virtually anyone. Soundtrack by David Bowie."
Recorded with a VHS Panasonic camcorder conected to a Roland V8 video mixer. Life vdeo mixing.
Soundtrack of this video was made with loops & a Bill Clinton speech.
